name: bcp_alt

scripts.test: echo 'TODO: Add a test runner and then update this command'
scripts.build: pkg src/bcp_alt && mkdir -p dist && mv bcp_alt-* dist
scripts.build_x64: pkg -t node16-macos-x64,node16-linux-x64,node16-win-x64 src/bcp_alt && mkdir -p dist/x64 && mv bcp_alt-* dist/x64
scripts.build_arm64: pkg -t node16-macos-arm64,node16-linux-arm64,node16-win-arm64 src/bcp_alt && mkdir -p dist/arm64 && mv bcp_alt-* dist/arm64
scripts.preversion: git fetch --tags && npm run lint:check && npm test

description: Alternative to the bcp command written in Node
author: Jose Sabater
